name: Joe Stringer
body:
### Profile

I'm a recent graduate of the University of Waikato in Hamilton, New Zealand. The focus of my degree was in Computer Science with a specialisation in Networks. For the Honours component of my degree, I worked on OpenFlow 1.1+ support in Open vSwitch. At the end of this project, my work was recognised with first class honours.

My ongoing contributions to Open Source include:
* [Arch Linux](http://archlinux.org) - Assistance with the Wiki and PKGBUILDs
* [RouteFlow](http://cpqd.github.io/RouteFlow) - Development on extensibility and use with OpenFlow hardware
* [Open vSwitch](http://openvswitch.org) - OpenFlow-1.1+ feature implementation

You'll find me hanging around FOSS mailing lists, Hacker News and Slashdot. In my spare time, I enjoy listening to music and jamming on my drum kit. You can contact me via gmail at [joestringernz](http://mailto:joestringernz+gio@gmail.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
